item.description:
Booty. Vortex.

not words one would normally put together ... unless you've been to a booty vortex show. then you really can't think of one without the other....

so yes, this is late notice, but we're booty vortexing again. come on out to johnny d's to shake it and get all happy and sweaty.

note: i'm posting this but i may not make it to johnny d's until after the show starts due to a prior commitment earlier in the evening. however, patrick, the organizer of the Metro-Boston Active Beer meetup group, has posted this as a meetup, too, and he has graciously offered to meet and greet folks on saturday evening.

see the Metro-Boston Active Beer posting here.
item.how_to_find_us: please look for patrick, the dude with the pony tail.
item.name: Booty Vortex @ Johnny D's
